name: [Enter name]
text0: Losers are those people who live forgetting about many things.
text1: Sometimes the most tender feelings can be hidden behind a mask of cold indifference...
text2: The sooner people know the bitterness of defeat, the greater they will become.
text3: People seem to like to call «talent» what they can't see.
text4: You can't judge people by mere memories.
text5: Sometimes a moment is enough to forget life, and sometimes life is not enough to forget a moment.
text6: Even knowing the truth, you may simply not understand it.
text7: The brake is also a mechanism!
text8: Everyone lives as he wants and pays for it himself.
text9: When a lie is uttered, the most important thing is not what the lie is, but why it was uttered.
text10: When there is someone with whom you can share everything, this is happiness.
text11: See what you thought. They think, we think that we do, and really think that we think so, and we only think that we think so, I think...
text12: Understanding others is easier than understanding yourself.
text13: The one who knows how to do something is the servant of the one who knows why it should be done.
text14: I feel strange if you have to forbid children everything that I did myself.
text15: A plan cannot be perfect if people are involved in it.
text16: The happiest moment in my life... have you noticed that it changes every time?..
text17: A person who tries to imitate someone still does it in his own way! No one can hide their nature and habits!
text18: I can't hear you, it's too dark in here...
